Did you know that you can cancel any electronic consignment notes that you have created yet not sent within our billing week by emailing:
connote.deletion@startrack.com.au (NSW / QLD) southwest.deletion@startrack.com.au (VIC / SA / NT / TAS / WA)

Dear Customer,
Thank you for your email.
Your query has been registered in our system for investigation.
Your query reference is: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Please note it may take up to 15 business days for investigations, you will receive an email notifying you of the outcome upon completion.
NOTE: Please be advised you are now able to lodge your credit claim online by completing our credit claim form via https://forms.startrack.com.au/tools/credit-claim/
Regards,
Customer Resolution Team StarTrack
